mathematica: IntegerExponent[#, 2] & /@ Nest[Append[#, Block[{k = 3}, While[Or[MemberQ[#, k], GCD[#[[-1]], k] == 1], k++]; k]] &, {1, 2}, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, May 22 2018 *)
